original_title: Are You the Favorite Person of Anybody?
overview: A man with a clipboard asks passersby a survey question: "Are you the favorite person of anybody?" He has a scale, from "very certain" on down. His manner is open. He offers oranges to one respondent. He talks, one at a time, to three people. Their answers, however brief, are revealing.
title: Are You the Favorite Person of Anybody?
